item.title: Shares are higher in Asia in an upbeat start to the new year
item.description: Asian shares have begun the new year with an upbeat start, led by a 2% gain for Hong Kong's Hang Seng index

item.title: Health subsidies expire, launching millions of Americans into 2026 with steep insurance hikes
item.description: Enhanced tax credits that have helped Americans offset the cost of Affordable Care Act health insurance for the last four years expired overnight

item.title: Betty Boop and 'Blondie' enter the public domain in 2026, accompanied by a trio of detectives
item.description: Betty Boop and “Blondie” are among the highlights of titles entering the public domain with the arrival of 2026

item.title: Trump administration orders a Colorado coal-fired power generator to stay open
item.description: The Trump administration has ordered another coal-fired power facility to remain open

item.title: Farmers can now learn how much aid they will get from the Trump administration
item.description: Farmers are now learning how much aid they can expect to receive from a $12 billion package that President Donald Trump announced earlier this month
